# VEinterpolation

## Installation

You can install the development version of `{VEinterpolation}` from
GitHub:

``` r
devtools::install_github("Epiconcept-Paris/VEBIS_EHR_VE_impact_study_interpolation")
```

## Demo

This package allows to interpolate weekly data from 8-week data from
vaccine effectiveness (VE) data.

See the dedicated vignette for more details:

- [Interpolate Monthly Data to Weekly
  Data](https://epiconcept-paris.github.io/VEBIS_EHR_VE_impact_study_interpolation/articles/interpolate_monthly_data_to_weekly_data.html)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`DecayModel`](DecayModel.md) : DecayModel class
- [`build_time_objects()`](build_time_objects.md) : Build time objects
  for interpolation
- [`compare_decay_models()`](compare_decay_models.md)
  [`plot_model_comparison()`](compare_decay_models.md)
  [`get_best_model()`](compare_decay_models.md)
  [`get_best_model_name()`](compare_decay_models.md)
  [`get_best_model_instance()`](compare_decay_models.md) : Compare
  multiple decay models
- [`decay_functions()`](decay_functions.md)
  [`logistic_decay()`](decay_functions.md)
  [`logistic_simple_decay()`](decay_functions.md)
  [`exponential_decay()`](decay_functions.md) : List of decay functions
- [`decay_functions_period_avg()`](decay_functions_period_avg.md)
  [`logistic_decay_period_avg()`](decay_functions_period_avg.md)
  [`logistic_simple_decay_period_avg()`](decay_functions_period_avg.md)
  [`exponential_decay_period_avg()`](decay_functions_period_avg.md) :
  List of period-averaged decay functions (log(1-VE) scale)
- [`get_se_from_ci()`](get_se_from_ci.md) : Get standard error from
  confidence interval
- [`sample_8_weeks_data`](sample_8_weeks_data.md) : sample_8_weeks_data
